chapter.title: Flathunt Developer Guide
chapter.para: Flathunt is an application that is used to teach you programming. Flathunt is a "Scotland Yard"-like game that will mainly appear in the assignments for the Introduction to Programming course. It is based on the Traffic library for modeling the city where the game takes place and on EiffelMedia (formerly known as ESDL) for visualization.

This document describes Flathunt and is structured as follows:
